/* No. 내림차순 */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT X.* , ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT CO_CD , APP_NO /* 결재선 번호 */ , APP_SEQ /* 결재 순번 */ , ID /* 작성자 ID */ , ( SELECT NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 B WHERE A.ID = B.ID ) AS USER_NAME /* 작성자 이름 */ , A.APP_DIV /* 결재선 구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.APP_DIV) AS APP_DIV_NM /* 결재선구분 명 */ , APP_LINE_NM /* 결재자명 */ , APP_ID /* 결재자 id */ , B.APP_USER_NM /* 결재자명 */ , USE_YN /*사용여부 */ , B.DEPT_NM /* 부서명 */ , (SELECT D.LEVEL_NM FROM TB_CM07M01 D WHERE D.LEVEL_CD=B.LEVEL_CD) AS LEVEL_NM /* 직급 */ , B.EMAIL /* E-mail */ , B.TEL_NO /* 전화번호 */ , B.OFF_TEL_NO /* 회사번호 */ , B.FAX_NO /* fax번호 */ , PG_PATH , ETC_FIELD1 , ETC_FIELD2 , ETC_FIELD3 , CREAT_ID , CREAT_PGM , NVL(TO_CHAR(UDT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')) AS CREAT_DTTM , UDT_ID , UDT_PGM , UDT_DTTM FROM TB_BM13M01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BB.ID AS USER_ID , BB.NAME AS APP_USER_NM , BB.LEVEL_CD , BB.EMAIL , BB.TEL_NO , BB.OFF_TEL_NO , BB.FAX_NO , CC.DEPT_NM FROM TB_CM06M01 BB INNER JOIN TB_CM04M01 CC ON(BB.DEPT_ID=CC.DEPT_ID) WHERE 1=1 ) B ON(A.APP_ID=B.USER_ID) WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY CREAT_DTTM DESC ) X ) WHERE 1=1 AND RN BETWEEN ${firstIndex} AND ${lastIndex}

/* No. 내림차순 */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT X.* , ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT CO_CD , APP_NO /* 결재선 번호 */ , APP_SEQ /* 결재 순번 */ , ID /* 작성자 ID */ , ( SELECT NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 B WHERE A.ID = B.ID ) AS USER_NAME /* 작성자 이름 */ , A.APP_DIV /* 결재선 구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.APP_DIV) AS APP_DIV_NM /* 결재선구분 명 */ , APP_LINE_NM /* 결재선명 */ , APP_ID /* 결재자 id */ , B.APP_USER_NM /* 결재자명 */ , USE_YN /*사용여부 */ , B.DEPT_NM /* 부서명 */ , (SELECT D.LEVEL_NM FROM TB_CM07M01 D WHERE D.LEVEL_CD=B.LEVEL_CD) AS LEVEL_NM /* 직급 */ , B.EMAIL /* E-mail */ , B.TEL_NO /* 전화번호 */ , B.OFF_TEL_NO /* 회사번호 */ , B.FAX_NO /* fax번호 */ , PG_PATH , ETC_FIELD1 , ETC_FIELD2 , ETC_FIELD3 , CREAT_ID , CREAT_PGM , NVL(TO_CHAR(UDT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')) AS CREAT_DTTM , UDT_ID , UDT_PGM , UDT_DTTM FROM TB_BM13M01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BB.ID AS USER_ID , BB.NAME AS APP_USER_NM , BB.LEVEL_CD , BB.EMAIL , BB.TEL_NO , BB.OFF_TEL_NO , BB.FAX_NO , CC.DEPT_NM FROM TB_CM06M01 BB INNER JOIN TB_CM04M01 CC ON(BB.DEPT_ID=CC.DEPT_ID) WHERE 1=1 ) B ON(A.APP_ID=B.USER_ID) WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY APP_NO DESC, APP_SEQ DESC, CREAT_DTTM DESC ) X ) WHERE 1=1 /* 엑셀은 전체 조회 */
SELECT DISTINCT DECODE(INSTR(APP_NO, #{userId}||'-'), 0, 'test01-01' , #{userId}||'-'||LPAD( MAX( TO_NUMBER(SUBSTRING( APP_NO, -2)) ) OVER()+1, 2, '0') ) AS MAX_APP_NO FROM TB_BM13M01 WHERE 1=1

SELECT NVL(MAX(APP_SEQ)+1, 1) AS APP_SEQ FROM TB_BM13M01 WHERE 1=1
